description: Detects the malicious use of a control panel item Author: Kyaw Min Thein, Furkan Caliskan (@caliskanfurkan_). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Control Panel Items
query: ((process.command_line:*.cpl AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\\System32\\* OR *%System%*)))) OR (process.executable:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line:*add* AND process.command_line:*CurrentVersion\\Control\ Panel\\CPLs*))
